pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixture of Markov Chains with Support of Higher Orders and Multiple Sequences // Fit mixture of Markov chains of higher orders from multiple sequences. It is also compatible with ordinary 1-component, 1-order or single-sequence Markov chains. Various utility functions are provided to derive transition patterns, transition probabilities per component and component priors. In addition, print(), predict() and component extracting/replacing methods are also defined as a convention of mixture models.
